comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I did some double-checking on the 'Erina' - A photo in the Stanton Library - photosau.com.au/StantonPictures/scripts/home.asp - search for "erina", shows the same bow and decorative woodwork as here. The 'Erina' has a trial trip, full technical description - SMH 31/07/1903 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14541926. Therefore this photo is earliest 1903. A collision in 1904 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14601246 Another in 1909 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15044332 Aground in 1911 at Sans Souci - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15232415 Damaged in Broken Bay 1930 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16695778
